mapper.select: SELECT X.BIZ_AREA_ID AS bizAreaId, X.BIZ_AREA_NM AS bizAreaNm, X.BIZ_AREA_DESCR AS bizAreaDescr, Y.TRGT_ID AS trgtId, Y.TRGT_NM AS trgtNm, Y.TRGT_TYP AS trgtTyp, Y.IP AS ip, Y.PRT AS prt, Y.USR_ID AS usrId, Y.PW AS pw, Y.SERV AS serv, Y.SCHM AS schm, Y.PTH AS path, Y.CLCT_CYCL AS clctCycl, Z.DBMS_TYP_ID AS dbmsTypId, Z.DBMS_TYP_NM AS dbmsTypNm, Z.DBMS_VER AS dbmsVer FROM BIZ_AREA X, TRGT Y, DBMS_TYP Z WHERE X.BIZ_AREA_ID = Y.BIZ_AREA_ID AND Y.DBMS_TYP_ID = Z.DBMS_TYP_ID
